@Marc_IRL：
Realms on PC now has 50 survival, minigame, and adventure maps that you can load and play! Find out how at https://help.mojang.com/customer ... for-pc-java-edition
PC版本的Realms新增50个生存，迷你游戏，和冒险地图，你一定会喜欢！详细操作信息请在这里阅读：
